name: MEC Line Lock
description: Maybe you’re knot-challenged. Maybe it’s just too cold to take off your gloves. Either way, you’ll appreciate how these locks securely adjust guylines on tents or tarps. The hold firmly in regardless of strong winds or vibration.Engineering grade nylon is UV resistant and tested to sub-zero conditions.Toothed shape holds loads without damaging lines.Easy to rig.Small fits ropes 1 to 3mm, Large fits 2 to 5mm.
